item.title: HTB Business CTF - Swarm Writeup
item.description: This is a writeup for my 2024 Hack The Box Business CTF FullPwn Machine, Swarm. While I was not initially planning on creating a dedicated writeup for the machine, it was brought to my attention that many players regarded the privilege escalation as ungodly. As such, I felt a responsibility to provide the traumatised players with a thorough explanation for my creation.
